Control Name: PERF 8.1 Understand the areas where performance is most critical
Control Statement: Understand and identify areas where increasing the performance of your workload will have a positive impact on eﬃciency or customer experience. For example, a website that has a large amount of customer interaction can beneﬁt from using edge services to move content delivery closer to customers.

control_attributes.Control: PERF 8.1 Understand the areas where performance is most critical
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you use tradeoﬀs to improve performance?
